remarks.para: A random 25% of lights may be inoperative provided:

numlitem.para: At least two of the three lights at each entry door are operative, and
Flight deck light and one upper deck door light for an operative door/slide is operative at all times.

note.para: Not required for an inoperative or deactivated main entry door, or for main entry doors located in the main deck cargo area of all-cargo and combination cargo/passenger aircraft.

placard.para: Placard near affected Light as appropriate: "____ LIGHT(S) INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
